alert.note: Alert for Clarion; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL VENANGO AND NORTHWESTERN CLARION COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM EDT... At 143 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Franklin, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oil City, Franklin, Sugarcreek, Hasson Heights, Seneca, Polk, Rouseville, Kennerdell, Woodland Heights, Oil Creek State Park, and Cranberry Township. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
